synopsis.text: Kanta, a solitary young boy, finds a unique bond with an orphaned baby sika deer, Poyu, who possesses an extraordinary golden tail. When ruthless hunters target Poyu and the rest of the deer community, Kanta becomes their steadfast protector. This heartwarming tale, adapted from Daisaku Ikeda's children's novel and beautifully illustrated by Sho Murakami, sheds light on the tragic history of sika deer overhunting while celebrating the unbreakable friendship between children and these gentle creatures. Prepare to be captivated by Kanta and Poyu's inspiring journey as they stand against the odds to preserve their cherished friendship and protect the innocent lives of the deer.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
